cu.explanation_en: Setting the rlc log level to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and may prevent the gNB from starting or logging properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting the rlc log level to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and may prevent the gNB from starting or logging properly.
du.explanation_zh: 將 RLC 日誌級別設定為無效值 'invalid' 會導致日誌配置錯誤，並可能阻止 gNB 正確啟動或記錄。
